title: Complete Payment
body: Please pay £4.99 via SecurePay-Now to finish activation. The page looks familiar but the web address is different.

choices.label: Pay now
choices.feedback: Risky choice. This is a look-alike payment page. Attackers copy logos but the address is wrong. Your card could be stolen.

choices.label: Close and contact my bank
choices.feedback: Well done. Close suspicious pages and contact your bank using the phone number on the back of your card.
